code: import React from'react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const{user,logout}=useAuth();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-blue-600 mb-4",children:["Welcome, ",user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.name,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg text-gray-700 mb-6",children:"Manage your resume and account settings easily."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-x-4 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/resume/upload",className:"bg-green-500 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded-lg",children:"Upload Resume"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/resume/view",className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded-lg",children:"View Resume"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/theme",className:"bg-yellow-500 hover:bg-yellow-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded-lg",children:"Manage Theme"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,className:"bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded-lg",children:"Logout"})]});};export default Dashboard;
